data.description:
Embark on an exciting adventure of discovery and creativity with "Paleontology VR," the revolutionary virtual reality game that redefines the paleontological experience. Step into the shoes of a paleontologist as you explore in search of fossils and some other mysteries.

EPIC EXCAVATION
Equip yourself with the best shovel and delve into the earth in search of fossils. Feel the thrill of unearthing prehistoric treasures and discover the wonder of paleontology in every excavation.

DETAILED CLEANING
Move to the laboratory and experience the satisfaction of cleaning and polishing each fossil with your own hands. Adjust the machinery with precision and use chisel and hammer to reveal the hidden beauty of each discovery.

BUILD YOUR OWN MUSEUM
Construct your personalized museum with unique dinosaur skeletons. Embrace the challenge of a 3D puzzle, where every bone matters. Place the bones in their correct positions and admire your prehistoric masterpiece.

PARTY MODE - Multiplayer
Invite your friends to join the fun in party mode, where competition and cooperation intertwine. Showcase your paleontological skills in a fossil-building challenge. Can you trust your friends to get the best score?

Are you ready to become the master of virtual paleontology? Explore, create, and compete in a prehistoric world like never before!

We reserve the rights to increase the price in future updates of the game.
